Description of incident: At least 42 people who used their debit or credit cards at the same Murphy USA gas station have reported fraudulent charges to their financial accounts.  A local credit union claims that hundreds of people were affected.  Reports of fraudulent charges began in late May.  An investigation of the card reading devices at the gas station did not reveal any evidence that a skimmer had been used.  Thieves are using the financial information of victims to make fraudulent ATM withdrawals in California.
